faq.question1: What are the main advantages of industrial automation?
faq.answer1: Industrial automation helps improve production efficiency, product quality, and labor productivity, as well as reduce the risks of errors related to human factors. Additionally, automated systems provide more precise control over production processes, which can lead to reduced costs for raw materials and energy resources.
faq.question2: Which industries are most actively using industrial automation?
faq.answer2: Almost all industries use automated systems to some extent to improve production efficiency. However, certain industries use industrial automation more actively. These include: oil and gas industry; metallurgy; machine engineering; chemical industry; food industry.
